item.title: New project: EasyLift
item.description: Hey all. It’s been awhile since I wrote something. Over the past few weeks, as I’ve gotten more into The Gym (tm), I’ve also gotten more and more frustrated with the availability of iOS applications to track exercise goals / progress / etc. including building programs and plate calculations. Because of this, I decided I’d take a stab at writing my own that suits my exact preferences. After all, what is a hacker if not a weirdo who just says “screw it, I’ll do it myself?”
